EmailTemplate.name: C&PS_Portal-SRD-Comms-Subscription_Email_Operational.SRD Subscription March 2021
EmailTemplate.subject: Product reliability presentations are updated on the aerospace portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We would like you to be aware we updated our Product Reliability presentations on the aerospace portal. You can access them here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/service-request-updates]]>.
During the month of March we closed out the following Reliability Improvement Programs. These presentations will be available for the next 60 days. Document Title
Corrective Action/Documentation
ATA Chapter
OEM
Platform
Part Numbers(s)
Carbon seal, Fire seal, Ruptured Duct on Trent 900, HPBV
Seal redesign to reinforce convolute and rounding off the bolted ring to prevent wearing / tearing if contact is made. Program on hold per RR request.
ATA 75
Airbus
A380
3225090-7 During the month of Marchwe opened the following Reliability Improvement programs for root cause investigation. Document Title
Record Locator

Part Numbers(s)

SR-156405

560XL, Latitude 680
3888395-2, 3888487-2

For further information on these reliability improvement programs, please click on the document title.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Global Technical Operations Team
